page.title: 11AXE-VALE GARAGE
page.content: ON THE BUSY A38 THIS GARAGE,ONCE A SIMPLE PETROL AND SERVICE STATION,HAS BECOME A MAJOR EMPLOYER IN THIS AREA.STARTING WITH ONE BUS SOME TEN YEARS AGO,TWENTY COACHES ARE NOW BASED AT THE GARAGE. THE BUS SERVICE FROM BRISTOL TO BURNHAM-ON-SEA,ABANDONED BY BRISTOL OMNIBUS COMPANY,IS NOW RUN FROM HERE. COACH HOLIDAYS TO PLACES OF INTEREST IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND ON THE CONTINENT FORM AN IMPORTANT PART OF THE FIRMS ITINERARY. IN ADDITION DAILY EXCURSIONS AND PRIVATE HIRE ARE CATERED FOR. EMPLOYING REGULAR AND PART TIME STAFF,IT'S IMPORTANCE IN THE COMMUNITY IS INCREASING.
